data.title: A report out Thursday calls on Canada to decriminalize personal use of all narcotics and regulate cannabis, saying current policies are failing to reduce drug use or make Canadians safer.
3D printed gun explodes during testing by Australian police.
28 grade 10 students in Quebec stripped search due to a missing cell phone during an exam.

Orthodox Christian protesters, lead & organized by Priests, have brutally attacked gay rights activists in Georgia. “All this crowd, like zombies, they simply wanted to kill us. Not beat or humiliate, they simply wanted to kill us,” said Nino Kharchilava, one of the protesters.
RAF Fighter jets reported "escorting passenger plane to Stansted Airport"
Stockholm rioting continues for fifth night
Scientists Have Discovered The World's First Tetrachromat. She Sees 100 Million Colors.
British Man throws Grenade at a Local Mosque as reprisal for soldier killing; then went inside the Mosque allegedly trying to harm the people inside with a knife
5,000 cave paintings discovered in Mexico: "These groups escaped Spanish control for almost 200 years"
Magnitude 8.2 Earthquake Hits Russian Far East off Kamchatka
